
C2
Verses in the Book of Mark That Contain the Name Jehovah as Part of Direct or Indirect Quotations




VERSE

QUOTE OR REFERENCE

SUPPORTING REFERENCES



MARK 1:3

Isaiah 40:3

J7-14, 16-18, 22-24, 28-36, 39-44, 46, 49, 52, 53, 56, 57, 59-61, 63, 65, 66, 75, 88, 90, 93-96, 98, 100-102, 105, 106, 113-118, 123, 132, 136, 142, 144-147, 149, 154, 164-166, 172, 178, 185, 187, 200, 203, 209, 212, 213, 217, 227, 228, 235-239, 243, 244, 262, 265, 271, 273, 274, 284, 288, 290, 295-297, 306, 307, 310, 317, 319, 321-325


MARK 11:9

Psalm 118:25, 26

J7, 8, 10-14, 16-18, 21-24, 28-35, 38-44, 46, 47, 49, 52, 53, 60, 61, 63, 65, 66, 88, 90, 92, 93, 95, 96, 98, 100-102, 104-106, 113-117, 120, 122, 125, 129-133, 138, 142, 144-147, 150, 151, 154, 160, 161, 163-167, 170, 171, 178, 185-187, 203, 209, 210, 218, 228, 229, 244, 250, 262, 265, 269, 271, 273, 275, 287, 290, 295-297, 306, 307, 310, 317, 319, 321-325

Psalm 118:22, 23
